General.Name: Zhejiang Taitan Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Taitan Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of textile machinery in China. It offers rotor spinning machines, rapier looms, and double twisting machines. The company is involved in the production, sale, and consultation of textile machinery, accessories, mechanical equipment, textile equipment, household appliances, capsule machinery, and hardware products; and import and export of goods. It also offers road transport of goods. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Xinchang, China. Zhejiang Taitan Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shaoxing Titan Investment Co., Ltd.
